website_summaries.verdict: Uses a combination of acupressure nodes and memory foam to create a more comfortable experience for users.
pros: Provides more cushioning than hard plastic models
cons: Does not strap into all chair types

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice simple, but helpful device for creating some traction ...
customer_reviews.text: I have all kinds of back trouble and try all kinds of weird tools to help. This is a nice simple, but helpful device for creating some traction in the spine. Honestly, sometimes there is so little motion in my back that the very first level is too much, but it does help. Generally, you can move it up and down the spine to encourage some extension in different places. I really like that, when I place it a little higher up, just below the shoulder blades, I not only get extension in the spine, but it perfectly pulls my should blades apart and creates some movement in the muscle and other surrounding tissue.
customer_reviews.author: Wnda009

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I got this in preparation for buying an inversion table. I now have both and use both! This thing is excellent for getting a really deep, solid back crack all throughout my mid and upper back. I usually will use the 2/medium setting for a couple minutes if my lower back is feeling tight and/or as a precursor to getting on the inversion table. Great, Simple Product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: K Ray

customer_reviews.title: Solid product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my office chair, because I now spend most of the day sitting. When I went to place it on my chair I noticed that the retention strap was more or less useless because it failed to keep tight. Luckily it isnt necessary because the product just rests on the seat of the chair anyway. The needles were a little bit hard to get used to, but over all it kind of feels nice to have some pressure points on the back. Overall im very pleased for what I paid for. I only use level one for now, which is the least curved, and that seems to be more than enough.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Amador

customer_reviews.title: good support
customer_reviews.text: Pros: more comfy compare to regular foam ones. Gives you stronger support and little massage. Cons: kind of hard to assemble and switch between supporting levels. Don’t know how long the plastic will last. I’ll continue watch.
customer_reviews.author: USer

customer_reviews.title: I like it half way.
customer_reviews.text: It works great, and keeps me from needing the chiropractor every day. My chest likes to cave in, and stab me often. Laying on this opens it back up without the need of a chiropractor. What I don't like are hard plastic spikes all over it. I know they are supposed to be helpful, and feel good. They do not. I was expecting them to be at least a little softer than just hard plastic. It's just painful. I would have sent it back, but I figured out that if I cover it with a towel it softens them. Then I can lay on it very comfortably, and relax.
customer_reviews.author: James M. Hedges

customer_reviews.title: Stretch your lower back out
customer_reviews.text: Great for after yoga- I use it to stretch my increasingly tighter lower back. I tend to lay with this for two to five minutes slowly moving my lower spine up and down. Relieves the tightness for sure! I use it 5 days a week and definitely have less pain than just two weeks ago. Try the second setting seems to be good without being too strong a curvature!
customer_reviews.author: Ben Jonah

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, broke after couple uses.
customer_reviews.text: Broke after only 6 uses. I am a skinny guy, and still the plastic broke which holds the top of the arch support to the frame.
customer_reviews.author: M Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great stretch at my own pace
customer_reviews.text: Tried a few things to relieve my back pain but this stretched just the right amount. The low setting was OK however, the mid setting has stretched my back just right. For those who hate to see the doctor, I recommend trying this.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Great for back pain
customer_reviews.text: OMG this is a game changer for people suffering with back pain!!! There are 3 levels from slight stretch to harder stretch. I can only do the first level right now. It has acupressure points on it, which is uncomfortable at first, but after a few minutes, it feels good. I lay my head on a pillow as my back is stretched and decreases pain. I have 3 herniated discs and I can hardly bend forward, but after laying on this, I feel great. It is a perfect stretch. The company says it helps align the spine so I’m hoping my herniations go back in!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: SAVE YOUR MONEY!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a REAL review from a REAL buyer. LISTEN, This item is horrible.. It Did absolutely NOTHING to stop my back pain. If anything it caused more pain. Complete waste of money. Do yourself a favor and not purchase this item.
customer_reviews.author: Kandace

customer_reviews.title: Five minutes worth of your time.
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for more than a week. Everyday, I used to feel severe pain from my lower back. I’ve been following the instruction to use it for at least 5mins, twice a day. -the product have 3 arch level that can be adjusted depending on your own comfort. -the spikes gives more pressure but helps relaxes the muscles. -middle cushion supports the spine from too much pressure -easy to carry is a plus After my daily used, I can say that there’s an improvement on my back. Now I have lesser pain and more relaxed muscles. Will still continue using it.
customer_reviews.author: MC Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: A must have..!!!
customer_reviews.text: A must have item for everyone who sits in front of laptop/computer for long hours like me. Because of my work and studies, I stay in front of my machine more than 12 hours a day. Because of these long hours, I started to have severe back pain and couldn't have proper sleep at night. Went to chiropractor for twice a week to get started. Then bought this on my friend's recommendation. My first time using the back stretcher was very painful and couldn't lie for more than 30 seconds. Slowly started to feel comfortable and with a month, it helped a lot to overcome by back pain. Worth every penny and helped me sleep peacefully at night.
customer_reviews.author: Vinay

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, results right away
customer_reviews.text: Ok, this is NOT comfortable when you first use it. The longer you use it, and I'd you do the stretches included, it does help. The first session I had to keep telling myself to relax because my back was tensing up more. The longer I used it, the easier it was to get my back to relax and to try the stretches. Overall, I think this will really help my sore lower back!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Not what you think it is, would’ve been better buying a teeter instead
customer_reviews.author: chad crawley

customer_reviews.title: Package was left soaked in the rain. Product is ok.
customer_reviews.text: It was okay. Hard to put it into slots. It was a nice stretcher until you try to get up and the pain hits you. The delivery was noted at handed to resident which was a lie. It was left in the rain and soaked. I tried to contact Amazon but all they have is robo chat. Very disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Fleur

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Seriously amazing !! I have had back issues for years. Nothing major but tight sore muscles. After having my daughter I lost my arch and am not flexible no matter how much I excersize. This thing started to relieve pains within minutes. I’m laying on it now and slowly there’s a good achy relief! (Like ahhh hurts so good) lol and standing up feels better. Can’t wait to keep using this daily ! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Gore

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent back extension tool. Set up is simple, although it does take some wrist strength to initially assemble. You can adjust it for three different settings based on your backs needs. It works for lower and middle back. Very comfortable, stable, and would be easy to fit in a travel bag.
customer_reviews.author: D&K

customer_reviews.title: To each his own.
customer_reviews.text: My husband’s and my back ended up hurting worse than before we used the product. It didn’t get any better after several tries either.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolette

customer_reviews.title: It’s been amazing for my back!
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this thing for a few weeks and it’s been amazing! I have lower back issues and I can’t bend back very far. I’ve been using this and my back feels so much better. I can actually stretch back further than I have in a really long time. I will definitely continue to use this.
customer_reviews.author: haley

customer_reviews.title: Helped me to get some relief from my back pain
customer_reviews.text: My chiropractor recommended this stretcher for my back to excersize between my visits. I'm trying to use it at least every other day and so far it seems to work and I feel a great relief after using it. It was very easy to setup and the instructions were very clear. Great value for the price I paid and hopefully will reduce my chiropractor visits.
customer_reviews.author: djairo

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: Just didn't do anything for me. Foam roller is better. However may work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You can feel it working!
customer_reviews.text: Creates a nice traction-like stretch. I’ve been managing back pain for years. This is a great tool. I stretched about a minute in three sections of my spine. Then paused 10 minutes and when I went to stretch again, pop! Pop! Relieving. One star off due to how hard it is to set the levels by bending the plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Kezza

customer_reviews.title: Excruciating!!!
customer_reviews.text: I almost never leave reviews but this deserves one. This is excruciating!!! One of the most painfull things I have put my back through. Not only was the arch to much for my back, it was very difficult to bend the board to the second and third slots. And was even harder to get the board to latch into the slots. Poorly designed and constructed. I have used the acupressure mats and thought this would be better because of the streching. Stick with the flat mats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Back pain gone instantly!
customer_reviews.text: I have terrible back pains almost all the time and i have an office job...so this has been a life saver! I have one for the office and one for home. The moment you rest your back on this....you can feel the relief. I also use it as a back stretcher and lay on it on the ground! I even travel with this for work! It is a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon L.

customer_reviews.title: What a great back stretcher!
customer_reviews.text: I have major back problems and finding a back stretcher with low lumbar support is just what I need.... with this stretcher at just the perfect arch increments, has been aiding me in relieving my lower back pain. The deeper the breathe you take and the longer you take to exhale will help you attain the kinda of stretch you need.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Scarabaggio

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to adjust! Almost unable to set up all together.
customer_reviews.author: marianna Thompson

customer_reviews.title: A life Saver
customer_reviews.text: This works great and does the job, would buy again! Had this now for a few months and it's been a life saver. I use it almost every day and this is the only thing that keeps me walking upright!!! I highly suggest this if you have a bad back!!
customer_reviews.author: John Rola

customer_reviews.title: Helped with back pain that I couldn’t get rid of for 4 months!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pure magic! I had persisting back pain(probably a muscle spasm) that I couldn’t get rid of for over 4 months! Yesterday I set this back stretcher on the second position and laid on it while watching tv. The pain is gone and I still can’t believe it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Viktoriia Martynov

customer_reviews.title: no more pain!
customer_reviews.text: i purchased this product for work. i sit in a office chair for 8 hours a day. and my back starts killing me. i also have lordosis. first day of using this i was relived instantly for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Sheniqua

customer_reviews.title: Finally have pain relief!
customer_reviews.text: ’ve had mine for about 2 weeks now and holy cow is it amazing! I have a herniated disc and degenerative disc disease. Almost always in constant pain and I’ve never found anything to relieve my pain until this! I use it throughout the day even if it’s just in my office chair or sitting on the couch. I’ve had so much more flexibility and mobility and I’m not waking up in tears every day because I can’t get out of bed!
customer_reviews.author: King

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful stretch
customer_reviews.text: It really works. It is such a nice stretch for my lower back. No mention whatsoever of the strap that came with it or its purpose. The only thing I don't like about it is the spikes ,which I assume are for grip, are too high. My tee was not thick enough for extended use.
customer_reviews.author: BuyListenDebate

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy and simple to use and set up. I’m a bigger guy 230+ pounds and it supports me no problem. It helps stretch out my back and I’ve had some back problems from an accident a few years ago. It is really cool that there’s 3 different settings for the intensity of the stretch. Product came with instruction sheet that was very clear and has color pictures. I love it and I recommend this
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Back relief
customer_reviews.text: This is a life saver for me after a busy night at the hospital ! I always strain my back with patients when supporting them up. Or when I’m always on my feet. My other halfs job provides them with good benefits for a chiropractor but I can’t afford that so I decided to try this to have my own at home haha. And the only thing I dislike is the bumps but you end up getting use to them after you constantly use it.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Helped my back and neck pain
customer_reviews.text: This helped stretch both my back and neck out! I was skeptical but it was a reasonablemy priced option to try and it helped. Not the most comfortable thing in the world to lay on but the benefits are worth a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Tekky

customer_reviews.title: helpful
customer_reviews.text: I have lower back pain. I bought foam cushion but it didn’t work for me. This one is solid and gives better support and massage.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great help with back pain.
customer_reviews.text: Thank you very much to the seller. This really helps with my back pain. I feel no pain while sitting on a chair with this.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I was truly shocked with how fast this product worked and to be honest I was skeptical about it at first. I truly recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Paul

customer_reviews.title: Way to use
customer_reviews.text: After standing on my feet for longperiodsof time at work my back aches. After using the back stretcher it feels a lot better and even the next day back doesn't feel as tight. Made well and eady to use
customer_reviews.author: S Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Finally!!
customer_reviews.text: By far my first break since my disks had started acting up to the point I couldn't walk without excruciating pain and gritting my teeth in tears. Thank you so much!! Fast shipping and a small miracle in a cute storage bag. Easy and collapses for easy transport and storage. A true sto and go that helps in minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Great if you live in your office chair!
customer_reviews.text: Working from home has me in my office chair most of the day. My back starts killing me half way through the day despite my expensive chair. This has really help with my posture and pain.
customer_reviews.author: MikeSmith

customer_reviews.title: No relief
customer_reviews.text: Product doesn’t really provide much relief for arthritic back pain
customer_reviews.author: ken

customer_reviews.title: Solid Back Stretcher - May be hard to put together for some.
customer_reviews.text: The Back Stretcher Device by Bodyease is a solid stretcher. Pros Price, not too expensive. Construction - Can take some serious weight. Does what it says it does, stretches your back out. Cons Will be hard for some people to adjust/put together. The bumping pattern on the board itself can be painful for some (I personally like it, it's not bad for me) You can always throw a towel over it to help with that. All in all not a bad stretcher, does what it claims but takes some force to put together and or adjust levels. If you need to stretch your back out, this is not a bad buy.
customer_reviews.author: Galaxy Tech Review

customer_reviews.title: Durable, Useful
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect stuff for your back support. I use it for sitting support in my car or my office chair. It looks very durable and you can use both side of brace.
customer_reviews.author: Farshad

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: I guess I was expecting more. I don't like the nubs but can see how some would. I have to keep using it maybe I will warm up to it more.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: VERY HELPFUL
customer_reviews.text: VERY HELPFUL, recently got a job as front desk in an ER & my back was killing me . This was so helpful when I got home and it would just stretch my back and relieve the pain!
customer_reviews.author: Nell Castillo

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this item on last Thursday and arrived on Sunday, right after my soccer game, just about time. Tried it and absolute love it, good quality and real helped to relax my back.
customer_reviews.author: Axlroseok

customer_reviews.title: God bless the inventor of this gift....
customer_reviews.text: 40 year old constriction worker with back pain for over 10 years found relief for the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: not good as i thougth
customer_reviews.text: First, the main board was really hard to make it curved to fit in to tool. Second, it hurts my back after one time use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is for a present .
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for a present but I didn’t travel yet , so I can’t say if it is good or not .
customer_reviews.author: Maria F.

customer_reviews.title: Works good for me. I don't stay on it too long.
customer_reviews.text: When my back is sore and I can't bend over to pick things up.. I jump on this and a few minutes later I'm good to go. I don't normally write reviews but this thing works for me. Remeber to breathe out and relax.
customer_reviews.author: Troy C.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this
customer_reviews.text: My daughter purchased this for me and I use it everyday in my car. Helps me sit up straight and relieve pressure, when I remove it the pain comes back.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Grubbs

customer_reviews.title: awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Best $20 I've spent recently. Gives a great back stretch--I can only use the medium setting right now. Using twice a day (morning and night) for about 5 minutes has made a big difference in the tightness of my back muscles. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth M. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: So worth it
customer_reviews.text: It just works. Using this every 2-4 days has kept me without back pain longer than I have gone in years
customer_reviews.author: Barth Slung

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. I suggest following their directions and going easy
customer_reviews.author: Brian Perdue

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Took a little bit to put it together. Trying to use it everyday. It does help stretch the back out.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Malave

customer_reviews.title: Worth the$$$
customer_reviews.text: It has made a big difference in my back pain.
customer_reviews.author: Dee York

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this product a couple times since receiving. It works as advertised. I will continue to use and provide feedback.

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Good idea but very flimsy after a couple of uses
customer_reviews.author: K Mauldin

customer_reviews.title: Great for Relief of back pain.
customer_reviews.text: This product t works great and has helped almost eliminate my back pain.

customer_reviews.title: It is comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable and you can feel right away the results
customer_reviews.author: Isis & Pablo

customer_reviews.title: Back stretcher
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight easy to move around and work pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Cody s.

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It really works it help the stiffness in my lower back 👍🏾👍🏾
customer_reviews.author: reggie doss

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product has definitely improved my back and definitely can’t imagine not having it.
customer_reviews.author: dre English

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for anyone with back problems
customer_reviews.text: This product has made a world of difference for my back. I use the medium setting for 10 minutes and I feel brand new after getting off of it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Pellegrini

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This thing is really uncomfortable it gives you an okay stretch not worth the price though
customer_reviews.author: Cody Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Back stretcher
customer_reviews.text: Used this product every day for weeks. Didn't help with my back pain at all.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph C.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I stand on my feet all day and using this at night after I’ve showered is amazing! I sleep so much better i don’t cramp and have back pain anymore when trying the sleep. It really does stretch your muscles

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This was something I really needed for my back. Thank You for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: dan Beaulieu

customer_reviews.title: Buy it !!
customer_reviews.text: I have herniated discs so I bought this to help ease the discomfort when I drive or at work when I am sitting at a desk. This has product helped so much!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal martinez

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My dad recommended this to me. It seems to be helping my lower back.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Piece of 💩 if you want to adjust to level two or three forget about it. It’s impossible to make the adjustments. This product is only designed for level one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: Its not help for anything it is hard hurts in my back
customer_reviews.author: Adnane

customer_reviews.title: Immediate pain relief!
customer_reviews.text: This product is so versatile. It is helping me with back, hip and shoulder issues. So glad I bought it!!
customer_reviews.author: Robin L Dixon

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with
customer_reviews.text: I really like to stretch my back realized stress's or pain 🥰
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Payano

customer_reviews.title: This product really works!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It really helps with my back pain! It's so awesome to be able to get relief at the end of the day without medication!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Schoonover

customer_reviews.title: After using it, you feel your back muscles relaxed
customer_reviews.text: Work’s great on your back. You defenitly feel the stretching.🙂
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for stretching lower back muscles to help relieve spasms from injury
customer_reviews.author: Garth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Adjustable and easy to use. Helps with gentle streatch and relax.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What you see is what you get.
customer_reviews.text: It works just as I thought it would. Great for gently working into backbends.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth white

customer_reviews.title: This stretches the back out nicely.
customer_reviews.text: This thing works. When I would sleep in my back, I would wake up because my back would hurt. Since using this i am able to sleep on my back with no problem. I tried adjusting this to the 2nd position but it ended up hurting my back, so I just use it on the 1st level. This stretches the back out nicely.
customer_reviews.author: larissa

customer_reviews.title: Not use friendly
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely awful!! It is extremely hard to bend the plastic enough to even get it into a slot. You definitely cannot easily switch between levels, and the green cushon came off while trying to even out it together. Extremely disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Bumps on surface (for muscle relief?) are painful!
customer_reviews.text: The plastic material the arch was made of was covered with small pressure bumps that I guess where there to push into your muscles for relief, but frankly they were painful! I may have been able to keep this if it did not have the bumps on it. The arch options (3) were perfect. Returned it & going back to my yoga ball for back relief. Was hoping for this to work because of its convenient size.
customer_reviews.author: Elle_R

customer_reviews.title: Way too small if you are tall
customer_reviews.text: I'm a tall guy, and this little thing is a joke. Sent it back immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Jon S.

customer_reviews.title: A good supporter for back issue
customer_reviews.text: I suffered a low back pain for years, and tried various treatment: acupuncture, massage, chiropractor, etc.. they majorly provides temporary relief of pain but I believe the ultimate way to improve the issue is to maintain the spine and strength the muscle by myself.. I bought this stretcher and kept using it several days already. It is easy assembled, and very handy to use anywhere. I use it to exercise my spine before go to bed every night. It helps stretch my low back pretty well. At first it was a bit hurt but it gets better and better. I will keep using it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: This is great for realigning spine discs and you only have to ...
customer_reviews.text: I have chronic back, neck and shoulder pain. This is great for realigning spine discs and you only have to lie on it for about 5 min. It’s a bit hard to fasten the plastic board thing w the green bit into the black thing but I managed to get it to pop in. I’m not the strongest so probably won’t be a problem for you unless ur a lil weakling like me. But hey motivation, right?
customer_reviews.author: Isabella Sziraczky

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations! Improved posture after years of struggling.
customer_reviews.text: 160 lbs, 5'6" male for reference. Only been 2 days, and I feel so much better. I'm an office worker and tried this on the low setting in my chair at home, and I wasn't hurting like I usually do after an hour. I put it on the floor and did the medium setting for about 6 minutes...wow! I'm actually standing straight now without urges to slouch over, and my lower back pain actually has improved dramatically. This thing exceeded my expectations tremendously. Highly recommend to other slouchers and office workers. Buying another for work.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Possibly dangerous
customer_reviews.text: It was painful and uncomfortable but so is most back therapy so I stuck with it, but this last time I used it my head started to hurt so bad I thought I might need to go to the hospital, I couldn't get up for several minutes because of the pain, it was scary. Now I need to find a chiropractor open during quarantine.
customer_reviews.author: MacFam

customer_reviews.title: Feels good
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I both have bad backs. This gives a gentle stretch and relief. I like that it can be adjusted to different arch heights. My husband and I do not use the same setting at all. Very flexible that way. It seems like the more we are using it the better our backs are feeling. It just lightly stretches the muscles and for us feels great.
customer_reviews.author: jmbilletTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Second day and I already feel back relief! With every penny even if that's all I got- which I can tell its only going to get better! Easy to set up, grip bumps take getting used to, but actually help it stay in place. Perfect for both stretching and for a back support in the car! Might order a second!!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this product at first. After several uses at level 2 my back and neck pain has been reduced! It is like having a chiropractor in your home. Everyday I would wake up with low back pain and a dull achy neck. Since using this product, I don't have that pain anymore. I highly suggest this product to anyone who is suffering from back and neck pain.
customer_reviews.author: ThePatriot319

customer_reviews.title: Good Product!
customer_reviews.text: I have the back pain when I sit for a long time, so I have to use a pillow or cushion to support my back. However, I still feel sore after a while. I tried this stretcher and feel the support on my back. Even though it is not a miracle product but I can tell the difference. I feel much better after the sit. I love to put it on my working chair. The green color looks nice, too.
customer_reviews.author: SFKK

customer_reviews.title: Great way to stretch it out
customer_reviews.text: This little device is a BIG help you don't know how tight your spine is until you try to stretch it out. I did a lot of research to find the one the was durable, didn’t break on the bend and held up. I stress, you dont know how tight you are until you use this to get some relief.
customer_reviews.author: drf

customer_reviews.title: Stretching works buy this
customer_reviews.text: Wow this really works and feels great. You get sore after using but it’s muscle soreness which goes away after a good nights rest. I use before going to bed. Went to my Chropractor yesterday after using this for 20 days. He was impressed cause I didn’t need an adjustment except for my neck !!!
customer_reviews.author: kalliope m jaffey

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this negative stars, I would. That piece of plasting is so thick it's nearly impossible to bend into the level ONE shape. I threw my back out trying to do it, when it was only sore before. Not only does it not relieve pain, it just causes more. DO NOT RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Im a fan
customer_reviews.text: I was wasn't sure if this would be a waste on $ or not. But it was totally worth it. Iv had shoulder pain for awhile. It helps ALOT! I dont use it everyday. But I really do feel the difference after a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps My Back
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for stretching my back, especially my lower back. I actually still use it daily, and I’ve had it for months - maybe a year. It’s still in like new shape. Well made, very durable. Travels easily.
customer_reviews.author: Candi

customer_reviews.title: Helps a little
customer_reviews.text: Feels nice to stretch my back a little and sometimes even cracks my back. My family uses it on the lowest arch because anything higher and our heads don't even touch the floor. I wouldn't call it a godsend or anything, but it's nice while I'm on it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you like being stabbed in the back...
customer_reviews.text: The white part of the item with the spikes is extremely uncomfortable! Especially if laying on it. Like laying on nails!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Bumps poke into back- ouch
customer_reviews.text: I wish I understood the purpose of the hard plastic bumps...they just poke into my back and make me sore. I need to flex my back regularly to remain free of pain and stiffness, though, and this travels better than the large inflatable balance ball I use at home.
customer_reviews.author: G.M.I.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable while driving.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for some recent constant lumbar pain. Moderately comfortable when lying flat on your back, but very very nice while driving. The strap wasn’t very useful for cars or chairs.
customer_reviews.author: JD

product_meta.title: Back Stretcher - Lower and Upper Back Pain Relief, Lumbar Stretching Device，Posture Corrector - Back Support for Office Chair | Get Muscle Tension (White/Green)
product_meta.description: Color:White/GreenMagic Back Support is a convenient at home back pain treatment and preventative care product. It's a simple, passive way to gently stretch your entire back, helping to eliminate the source of your back pain and restore your natural back curve. How Does It Work? When lying down on Magic Back, gravity allows the front of your body to effortlessly stretch out and upwards, and the surrounding muscles start to relax, gently decompressing the discs in your vertebrae, realigning the spine, relieving tension and pain.You'll be amazed by how good you feel after just one use! As you get more advanced and flexible, you can adjust the curve on the arch to a more advanced setting, and in no time, you'll be walking taller, and with more confidence as your posture will improve. Unlike imitation products that break easily, Magic Back Support is designed to last, using thick hi tech ABS plastic for durability and longevity. Magic Back Support also comes with complete written directions, , a chair strap for when using as lumbar support, The unique thumb tip nodes on the arch, feel as if you're getting lightly massaged as your stretching. Adjustable lumbar stretchers are safer then inversion tables, and more effective then foam back stretchers. The arch on foam back stretchers are not adjustable which limits your ability to improve your flexibility, so what's the point of that? We're confident you'll be glad you purchased this lumbar extender, but for any reason, your not 100% fully satisfied, we got you covered with our risk free guarantee. Don't wait another day, and place your order for Magic Back Support today. Limited supplies.
feature_bullets: As doctor recommended:5 minutes twice a day of using this back stretcher is able to help relieve tension & Effective in treating pain from muscle spasms, pinched nerves, herniated discs, sciatica, degeneration, tight knots, excessive flexion and more! Simple to use, portable for easy travel.

Helps relieve back pain & posture correction: preventive care for your lower back and posture. daily activities involving extended use on the computer, sitting all day, or physical activities can lead to spine and posture imbalances. the back stretcher and lumbar support is uniquely designed to help correct and improve posture.
Designed for people of all ages. Ergonomic design includes a multi-level arch with 3 adjustable settings so that all ages and fitness levels can benefit from using and improve flexibility
